SELECT fno, name, score, poster, type, address, num FROM (SELECT fno, name, score, poster, type, address, rownum as num FROM (SELECT fno, name, score, poster, type, address FROM food_location WHERE address LIKE '%'||#{address}||'%' ORDER BY fno ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/12.0) FROM food_location WHERE address LIKE '%'||#{address}||'%'
